Type(s) of content in package: These are photos from development of latest GOES satellites. The operational data (not yet available) will be of the most value. These pictures are of lower value. GOES satellites are for weather and climate data. GOES-R (now GOES-16) was launched last year and the data feed does not yet seem to exist.

title: GOES-R Multimedia - Ground Segment
